name: Sokoban
description:
This is a leisure puzzle game.

Players need to complete the goal by pushing the box.

The game screen is fresh, simple and very beautiful, which will make you more addicted to playing.

Note: Do not push the box to the dead corner, or it will be unable to be pushed again.

Game features

1. Amazing graphics and effects;

2. Amazing game mechanism;

3. A variety of levels are waiting for you to challenge;

4. Simple and stylized graphic design;

Game advantages

1. It is a puzzle game to cultivate people's brain thinking and pass the exam quickly by thinking;

2. Simple and fresh retro game pictures and interesting push-pull games are waiting for you to experience;

3. The carefully set various game levels and various game props will definitely let you go to the end.
